title: Choose account settings
setting_description: Your country of residence determines which website you will use to access your chosen products and sign your contract. It also determines the billing currency for the website chosen
setting_description_list_first: 1. If you are a customer registered for VAT, GST or an equivalent tax, your country of registration is considered your country of residence
setting_description_list_second: 2. If you are a customer not registered for VAT, GST or an equivalent tax, but are registered as a “contractor”, your country of residence is the one where your contractor tax identification number is issued.
setting_description_list_last: 3. If you are a customer not registered for VAT, GST or an equivalent tax, your country of residence is generally considered to be the one listed in your billing address. In accordance with applicable laws, OVH may be required to cross-check this information with your IP address or the bank address linked to your payment method. If there is a discrepancy, OVH may contact you to confirm your country of residence
